payable","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@ziweidream","methods":{"bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function can only be called by the GameManager contract","params":{"_bettor":"the address of the bettor who placed the bet","_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetAmount":"the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in the game","_randomNum":"the random number generated when the supported player presses Button Bet in the game","_supportedPlayer":"the address of the supported player in the game"}},"getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetAmount":"the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game","_randomNum":"the random number generated by the front end when Button bet is pressed by the given corner","_supportedPlayer":"the given corner in this game for whom the attack type is randomly selected"},"return":"the attackType randomly selected for the given corner, the attackHash for the attackType selected, and the index of the attackHash returned in the fight map"},"getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are obtained"},"return":"an array of fixed size 7 blockedAttacks, which contains the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game"},"getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are obtained"},"return":"an array of fixed size 7 directAttacks, which contains the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game"},"getLastBet(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"if the given corner has never placed a bet in this game yet, the last bet amount is 0","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose last bet ether amount is displayed"},"return":"the last bet ether amount by the given corner in a game"},"getLastFourBets(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"lastBet1 is the last bet, lastBet2 is the second last bet, and so forth","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose last 4 bets amount are displayed"},"return":"the last 5 bet ether amount by the given corner in a game"},"getNumberOfBets(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded"},"return":"the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game"},"isAttackBlocked(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in this game"},"return":"true if the attack type is blocked, false if it is direct"},"randomGen(uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","return":"The random number generated"},"setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function is only called by GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_originalDefenseLevel":"the original defense level of the given corner, which is calculated in the function startGame() in GameManager","_player":"the address of the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded"}},"startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function can only be called by the GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_randomBlack":"the random number generated when the Black corner presses the Button Bet","_randomRed":"the random number generated when the Red corner presses the Button Bet"}}},"title":"This contract is responsible to carry out the betting module in a game"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"determines the attack type, attackHash, and current opponent defense level partially depending on the effect of each bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"randomly select attack types from low values column or high values column depending on the bet ether amount by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"getLastBet(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the ether amount of the last bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getLastFourBets(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the ether amount of the last 5 bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getNumberOfBets(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"isAttackBlocked(uint256,address)":{"notice":"determine whether the attack type by the supported player is blocked or direct in a game with a specific gameId"},"randomGen(uint256)":{"notice":"generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed"},"setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the original defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"setProxy(address)":{"notice":"Set/update address of Proxy contract"},"startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"generates a fight map for a game with a specific gameId, and calculates the original defense levels of both corners in this game"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/modules/algorithm/Betting.sol":"Betting"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/ContractManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x32b8e3734bf978a135f9081db4ddf429979259c65c039e60678e97600708dc9d","urls":["bzz-raw://2dcd7f80d4033013b65cd8d3f7035bf560c3d88cc88af1d9769d030f8496da6d","dweb:/ipfs/Qme6676pP26zN99LMR2cWKv2vLf77kXFL6MYzEYofKTmc8"]},"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/authority/Guard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2e8e5525879bffaaae3f706e4bc8b7107fd323b005eac4d7c8e302d36690bcf9","urls":["bzz-raw://3e2d989001fe649f3e86458e1a39697a214126a6a0d179cf8ec6714cca4109ee","dweb:/ipfs/Qmc5MHWMNrbDkEzFyv5u5S4dBEsiJbuHmefJoVne8wSd8W"]},"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/authority/Owned.sol":{"keccak256":"0x202ee248938052421a79a3dcb265cefb6adcaf6b85e61a1b5ab05acc58df5f59","urls":["bzz-raw://6aaaf3a6f8c739e5a7b65cf42b80963515a3435de05844a03c7606d881a9212d","dweb:/ipfs/QmbgwTPGnGc1cGrMxikCuNDi5zfhfyjFP7PB4YJHZwuY2z"]},"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/authority/SystemRoles.sol":{"keccak256":"0x08c2df5931ea53a33d7ac2cdd9988a5370b2f59bad6180ba62847cadf27d51ed","urls":["bzz-raw://f79d1644e52d660f2e5683c8165ece746a54cc0265193048aa21f52cfe8a4951","dweb:/ipfs/QmUEAra9ptRLDMNQUTJJWmgDX6iSg8crGx3MLvRQf5aC88"]},"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/interfaces/IContractManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb28573f194c3b5b055dbabace559f3c7f524120b8f9debff77e7775a68ea40a7","urls":["bzz-raw://a21a6ca4d0ba01a67aff02b0dc749f6c11e87b71ce21b0a92c929248ae7d37b0","dweb:/ipfs/QmSX59ApAZz8GXXD9ep7DdqZEHpeUQPSWbkzDJLnDt8XXc"]},"/Users/ziweizhang/Desktop/staking/alpha/contracts/libs/LinkedListAddrLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4d6a6bb63bbf3abb2c89785c66508cb3a3b47cb663f953f1b07a8e76e67d281a","urls":["bzz-raw://3decad1d5d462698537ce0dd8d9ec5c069d23f7ba53123e453676 nodes.name: getAttackType
isAttackBlocked
reduceDefenseLevel
randomGen

bet

devdoc.author: @ziweidream

bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.author: @ziweidream
bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.details: this function can only be called by the GameManager contract

params._bettor: the address of the bettor who placed the bet
params._lastBetAmount: the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game
params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in the game
params._randomNum: the random number generated when the supported player presses Button Bet in the game
params._supportedPlayer: the address of the supported player in the game

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.author: @ziweidream

params._lastBetAmount: the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game
params._randomNum: the random number generated by the front end when Button bet is pressed by the given corner
params._supportedPlayer: the given corner in this game for whom the attack type is randomly selected

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.return: the attackType randomly selected for the given corner, the attackHash for the attackType selected, and the index of the attackHash returned in the fight map

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are obtained

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).return: an array of fixed size 7 blockedAttacks, which contains the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are obtained

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).return: an array of fixed size 7 directAttacks, which contains the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game

getLastBet(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream
getLastBet(uint256,address).details: if the given corner has never placed a bet in this game yet, the last bet amount is 0

params._player: the given corner in this game whose last bet ether amount is displayed

getLastBet(uint256,address).return: the last bet ether amount by the given corner in a game

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream
getLastFourBets(uint256,address).details: lastBet1 is the last bet, lastBet2 is the second last bet, and so forth

params._player: the given corner in this game whose last 4 bets amount are displayed

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).return: the last 5 bet ether amount by the given corner in a game

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).return: the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in this game

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).return: true if the attack type is blocked, false if it is direct

setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.author: @ziweidream
setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.details: this function is only called by GameManager contract

params._originalDefenseLevel: the original defense level of the given corner, which is calculated in the function startGame() in GameManager
params._player: the address of the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded

startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).author: @ziweidream
startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: this function can only be called by the GameManager contract

params._randomBlack: the random number generated when the Black corner presses the Button Bet
params._randomRed: the random number generated when the Red corner presses the Button Bet

devdoc.title: This contract is responsible to carry out the betting module in a game

bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.notice: determines the attack type, attackHash, and current opponent defense level partially depending on the effect of each bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: randomly select attack types from low values column or high values column depending on the bet ether amount by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).notice: get the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).notice: get the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

getLastBet(uint256,address).notice: get the ether amount of the last bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).notice: get the ether amount of the last 5 bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).notice: get the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).notice: determine whether the attack type by the supported player is blocked or direct in a game with a specific gameId

randomGen(uint256).notice: generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed

setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.notice: record the original defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: generates a fight map for a game with a specific gameId, and calculates the original defense levels of both corners in this game
